reviews.text: This is a quiet and peaceful spot in East Coast Park. It has a sizeable pond with many plants and flowers. It also has benches for you to sit and enjoy the tranquility of the place.

üêùKPMG Wellness Garden is a therapeutic Garden that allow vistors to get close to nature to enhance the mental well-being through its biophilic effects.
üêûThe entire Wellness Garden consist of Therapeutic Garden, Nature Fitness Area, Nature Playgarden and Pond Trail that are suitable for visitors of all ages.
ü™≤The Pond Trail which goes around the entire Garden and the Pond allow vistors to go on a scenic tour.
ü¶ãCome spend some quality time here and be refreshed and recharged.

Totally worth the visit all the way from the west side to East Coast Park D in the early morning. The residents nearby should be appreciative and happy to have this add-on therapeutic Wellness Garden for the benefit of their health physically and mentally. The landscaping is a lot of efforts done up, do stroll through it slowly and appreciate the flora. Life is already very fast pace, slow down your pace in this beautiful garden, enjoy the sea breeze.

Mosquitoes repellent is recommended if you are wearing shorts.
Happiness with the fresh air and sea breeze along with the seashore. Happening lifestyle experience with the people around the way.
Latest wellness station  to the east coast park. Great place to stretch some muscles and burn some calories also. A  choice pitstop to rest and take a breather!
